PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-01002022-02-10,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  ISI
ActFood and Drugs Act
Patent Act
SubjectClinical Trials for Medical Devices and Drugs Relating to COVID-19 Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CLINICAL TRIALS FOR MEDICAL DEVICES AND DRUGS RELATING TO COVID-19 in order to 1) carry over the provisions from previous Interim Orders into regulations to maintain the more flexible authorization and implementation of clinical trials for COVID-19 related pharmaceutical drugs and medical devices; and 2) implement a record retention period of 15 years for clinical trials.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0018 Publication Date: 2022-03-02
AttachmentsAttachment
